LanguageData.RVC_Tutorial: Select one of the sets on the right to start editing the colors on your {0}! (If they have any you can edit.)
LanguageData.RVC_WarningColorEdit: Due to a weird error, after editing the last color of a set, change the second one just slightly to apply changes!
LanguageData.Vine_OverrideDefaultBlendingRatio: Override default human to non-human ratio: {DEFAULT}
LanguageData.Vine_FlushCachesToolTip: Flushes caches after a user-defined amount of pawns are generated. Only turn on if you have memory issues, as this setting may slightly increase pawn generation time.
